resources.string: Let’s calculate the discount for the item you want to buy based on the available categories! Please enter the following information:
Price after discount:\nAmount saved:\nFinal total (11% VAT):

This app helps calculate the final price of an item after applying discounts and 11% VAT based on categories like General, Food, and Electronics. Simply enter the price, discount, and category, and the app will display the final price and the amount saved.

This app was created as part of Assessment 1 for the Mobile Programming 1 course.
